name: I GOTTA SH!T
description:
u wanna poop but u dont got toilet paper. u better clench that poop deeper and deeper. 

Instructions:

  • Jump on enemies to clench your poop deeper!
  • Press space to speed through dialogue!
  • Hold space to jump higher!
